title: VSO
description: Registers a headless, self-hosted VS Online environment.

mail.description: Email address where code is sent to.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass ./install.ps1 ' , ' -mail ', parameters('mail'), ' -resourcegroup ' ,  parameters('resourcegroup'), ' -subscriptionid ', parameters('subscriptionid'), ' -user ', parameters('user'), ' -password (ConvertTo-SecureString ''', parameters('password'), ''' -AsPlainText -Force) '     , ' -planname ', parameters('planname') ) ]
